commit.title: ghaction/release: Pass Slack bot token instead of webhook
commit.message:
ghaction/release: Pass Slack bot token instead of webhook

We have updated our Slack integration to use a Slack bot token instead
of a webhook to be able to post threaded responses or react to messages.
For reference see: https://github.com/osbuild/release-action/pull/35

user.name: Ondřej Budai
user.bio: Principal Software Engineer @ Image Builder, Red Hat

commit.title: ghaction/release: Pass Slack bot token instead of webhook
commit.message:
ghaction/release: Pass Slack bot token instead of webhook

We have updated our Slack integration to use a Slack bot token instead
of a webhook to be able to post threaded responses or react to messages.
For reference see: https://github.com/osbuild/release-action/pull/35

of a webhook to be able to post threaded responses or react to messages.
For reference see: https://github.com/osbuild/release-action/pull/35
